TypeSignature.Value: public struct HashCode<T> where T : struct
.class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit HashCode`1<struct .ctor (class System.ValueType) T> extends System.ValueType

Docs.typeparam: The type of values to hash.
Docs.summary: Combines the hash code of sequences of values into a single hash code.
Docs.remarks: The hash codes returned by the method are only guaranteed to be repeatable for the current execution session, just like with the available APIs.In other words, hashing the same collection multiple times in the same process will always result in the same hash code, while the same collection being hashed again from another process (or another instance of the same process) is not guaranteed to result in the same final value. For more info, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int32 Combine(valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<!T> span) cil managed
Public Shared Function Combine (span As ReadOnlySpan(Of T)) As Integer
static member Combine : ReadOnlySpan<'T (requires 'T : struct)> -> int

Docs.summary: Gets a content hash from the input instance using the xxHash32 algorithm.
Docs.returns: The xxHash32 value for the input instance
Docs.remarks: The xxHash32 is only guaranteed to be deterministic within the scope of a single app execution
